query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'cte_notas' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chave%' ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HdhHhoU3VLn73V.2659abed3564 --database 2ckaMFDgknxSWbaAs85a3h --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'cte_notas' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chave%' ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
chaveAcesso	varchar
